attacks.name: Explosive Evolution
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.) Then, search your deck for a card that evolves from Dark Pupitar and put it on Dark Pupitar. (This counts as evolving Dark Pupitar.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Double Tackle
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to each Defending Pokémon.
